public class Circuit extends AbstractResource
Represents a circuit.

  • Constructor Details

    • Circuit

      public Circuit(String name, String type, int length, int cornersNumber, String address, String description, int lapPrice, boolean available, byte[] image, String imageMediaType)
      Constructs a Circuit object with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the circuit.
      type - The type or category of the circuit (e.g., road, karting).
      length - The length of the circuit in meters.
      cornersNumber - The number of corners on the circuit.
      address - The address/location of the circuit.
      description - The description of the circuit.
      lapPrice - The price of one lap on the circuit.
      available - True if the circuit is available for use; otherwise, false.
      image - The image data of the circuit.
      imageMediaType - The media type of the image (e.g., "image/jpeg", "image/png").

    • Circuit

      public Circuit(String name, String type, int length, int cornersNumber, String address, String description, int lapPrice, byte[] image, String imageMediaType)
      Constructs a Circuit object with the specified attributes (assuming the circuit is available by default).
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the circuit.
      type - The type or category of the circuit (e.g., road, karting).
      length - The length of the circuit in meters.
      cornersNumber - The number of corners on the circuit.
      address - The address/location of the circuit.
      description - The description of the circuit.
      lapPrice - The price of one lap on the circuit.
      image - The image data of the circuit.
      imageMediaType - The media type of the image (e.g., "image/jpeg", "image/png").

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the circuit object.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string containing the name, type, length, corners number, address, description, lap price, and availability of the circuit.

    • writeJSON

      protected void writeJSON(OutputStream out) throws Exception
      Writes the circuit data in JSON format to the provided output stream.
      Specified by:
      writeJSON in class AbstractResource
      Parameters:
      out - The output stream to which the JSON data will be written.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while writing JSON data to the output stream.

    • fromJSON

      public static Circuit fromJSON(InputStream in) throws IOException
      Constructs a Circuit object from JSON data read from the provided input stream.
      Parameters:
      in - The input stream containing the JSON data representing the circuit object.
      Returns:
      A new Circuit object constructed from the JSON data.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there's an error reading from the input stream or parsing the JSON data.

    • hasPhoto

      public final boolean hasPhoto()
      Checks if the circuit has a photo available.
      Returns:
      true if the circuit has a photo; false otherwise.
